description._content: Image taken from: Title: "State-Book of Pennsylvania, containing an account of the geography, history, government, resources, and noted citizens of the state, etc" Author: BURROWES, Thomas Henry. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.bbb.29." Page: 228 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1847 Publisher: A. Hunt & Son Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000545425 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
